definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
"cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc
to take strict precautions/on your guard

sentences.english: The teacher is strict with his students and in his work.
sentences.chinese: 这位老师对他的学生要求严格，对工作要求也严。

sentences.english: Are present cell phone safety standards strict enough?
sentences.chinese: 现在的手机安全标准够不够严？

sentences.english: Yan notes that the Möbius forms displayed both right and left handed twists.
sentences.chinese: 严指出，莫比乌斯形式显示正确和左手曲折。

sentences.english: We then got to view statues of the 18 levels of Hell and the torture methods used within.
sentences.chinese: 我们还参观了十八层地狱和阴天子的严拷方式。

sentences.english: Yan Tianchi was one of the founders of Yushan Guqin School in Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 严天池是明代虞山琴派的创始者之一。

sentences.english: The little girl did not listen to the speech, Yan Baba to see the officers and men.
sentences.chinese: 小女孩没有听讲话，看见官员和人的严酵母酒蛋糕。

sentences.english: Super efficient point in vector optimization problems with set-valued maps characterized by generalized saddle point;
sentences.chinese: 本文研究集值优化问题严有效解的广义鞍点刻画问题。

sentences.english: Several professors hustled Zhang out of the room while Yan called the police.
sentences.chinese: 在其他几位教授催促张离开房间的同时，严电话报警。

sentences.english: She will be on the towel wrapped tightly, or feeling cold.
sentences.chinese: 她将身上的毛巾被裹严，还是感觉冷。

sentences.english: In contrast, the traditional Chinese educational philosophy represents solemnity outside while love inside.
sentences.chinese: 中国传统教育理念是“严”在其表，爱在其里。

sentences.english: President Yen Chia- kan presides over a rally in memory of the late President Chiang Kai-shek.
sentences.chinese: 中枢举行总统蒋公逝世纪念会，严总统亲临主持。

sentences.english: I feel there is a problem with China's PR policy, internally too rigid, externally too soft.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得还是党妈的宣传有问题，对内严对外松。

sentences.english: Yan Can not only inherited the results of traditional research on The Book of Songs, but also made bold innovations.
sentences.chinese: 严粲不仅承袭传统诗学成果，而且进行了大胆的创新。

sentences.english: Strict Management, Superior Quality, Stressing Reputation and Pay Attention to Service.
sentences.chinese: 严管理，高品质，讲信誉，重服务。

sentences.english: You scolded him rather too severely for such a small offence.
sentences.chinese: 为了这么点小错你对他是责之过严了。

sentences.english: We must study hard from now on.
sentences.chinese: 我们应当严于一切职守。

definition: first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
